tweets.text:
Did you know? 

üè†The average cost of flood damage to a home is ¬£30,000

üí∑ The average cost to a business is ¬£82,000

‚û°Ô∏è 12% people don't know if they are in a flood risk area

Taking steps to prepare can reduce damages (by around 40%) https://t.co/a5nLshEGSO

#FloodActionWeek https://t.co/HCBGJrA8r7

@bill_brierley @EnvAgency @NaturalEngland Interesting. I joined Twitter in Oct 2015. Feel free to show me a single Tweet since then when I said anything at all critical of those "Hard working and dedicated people who are trying to protect the environment"?

domain.name: Brand Category

tweets.text:
Being prepared for flooding and knowing what to do in flood can significantly reduce the damage to homes and possessions (by around 40%)
Find out what to do in a flood: https://t.co/29saU23JrY. #FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive. https://t.co/32GGUwAdPU

PS. Why does the @EnvAgency make people visit their local offices just to view these applications?

Can they not simply post them online like everyone else?

So much for openness and transparency.

Do you know what to do in a flood? Make sure you know the simple steps to take if a Flood Alert, Flood Warning, or Severe Flood Warning is issued in your area üëá

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/sXatK90YWd

As people spend more time at home due to the #coronavirus pandemic the @EnvAgency is urging to check if you live on a flood plain.

Mary Dhonau's home in Worcester was damaged in a flood and says she wants more people to be aware of the risks. 

Read more: https://t.co/OVw4tfLybW https://t.co/VyQfPtO80n

Similarly as a proud ex @EnvAgency employee it is shocking and anyone who has a go @NaturalEngland or @EnvAgency should think again - @Feargal_Sharkey and start working with these hard working and dedicated people who are trying to protect the environment. https://t.co/YCwaBdw6jD https://t.co/4vbz6jPfK8

Do you know how to survive a flood? Survivalist Megan Hine explains the three things you need to know üëá 

Over 5 million UK homes are at risk of flooding. Don't assume it won't happen to you.

https://t.co/CsUTBjY5Ft 

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive

@Meg_Hine https://t.co/Bf3koSXpds

We're hosting our very first virtual resident meeting for the Otley Flood Alleviation scheme on Wednesday 18 November, from 4pm. Join us, @BAMNuttall and @EnvAgencyYNE as we give an update and answer all your questions. Sign up here https://t.co/4x3QvxTUfv #flooding #Leeds https://t.co/VV2L5pPF12

Congratulations @GloucesterCity on winning @CPREGloucs  award for biodiversity work on Sud Brook. We‚Äôre pleased to have been a funder and adviser to the project. Learn more https://t.co/xUXEZRqzue #riverRestoration @severnvalecaba
@GroundControlGC Weed cutting today at the river Idle in Retford, for the @EnvAgency. Maintaining the waterway for flood prevention in the nearby community. https://t.co/Adg47FNJMJ

tweets.text:
It's #FloodActionWeek!

Make it your aim to know what to do in a flood to keep yourself and the things you love safe.

Learn what to do in a flood in the @EnvAgency 's great video below.

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/D8k74PrXaM

It's #FloodActionWeek and we're helping to raise awareness with the @EnvAgency about the impact #flooding can have on our lives. 

Know what to do in a flood, find out more information on the government website here https://t.co/1YHULPAeo8 https://t.co/tLAmdb0gdi
This is appalling. The UK should be a leader in the green recovery. @UKLabour @theSNP @TheGreenParty @Conservatives @GeorgeEustice_ @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency sort this out. üò† https://t.co/7iIZMtSpms

Part of the Trans Pennine Trail re-opened after an upgrade to flood defences at Hull's Victoria Dock Village https://t.co/bwwgv2mKS0

These improvements are part of the ¬£42m tidal scheme.

Be prepared, have a flood plan  
#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware https://t.co/wwueotBnkz https://t.co/ay7oz07E8K

tweets.text:
It's #FloodActionWeek, and I've written a blog on how #TeamEA have been preparing for winter - from building & repairing new flood defences, to enhancing our #FloodWarning system and training 6,500 staff: https://t.co/pVdjmzZUIL

The @EnvAgency is ready for winter, are you?

Look! @wessexwater, who last year spent 107,434 hours dumping sewage into local rivers and on 813 separate occasions dumped sewage into our seas, has just applied to the @EnvAgency for a new sewage dumping permit.

But will the EA refuse the application?

https://t.co/nl5a7W7qo0

And our final talk was from @GeorgiFauconier who showed us some amazing images of Microsporidia in European #smelt. This was work done with @ZSLScience @NHM_London @EnvAgency @GarethDDaviesEA @Bruneluni https://t.co/elZF5eAWQo
And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/OyzkQeAqy5

It's #FloodActionWeek!

Make it your aim to know what to do in a flood to keep yourself and the things you love safe.

üëâLearn what to do in a flood: https://t.co/yDrqZN037T

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/i10cYZkcUj

Look! @wessexwater, who last year spent 107,434 hours dumping sewage into local rivers and on 813 separate occasions dumped sewage into our seas, has just applied to the @EnvAgency for a new sewage dumping permit.

But will the EA refuse the application?

https://t.co/nl5a7W7qo0

Would you know what to do in a flood? Taking action before a flood could keep the things you care about safe #prepareactsurvive

Find out more: https://t.co/EXxxuQzaTJ @EnvAgency https://t.co/Wpl8SWIL2Q

It's #FloodActionWeek!

Make it your aim to know what to do in a flood to keep yourself and the things you love safe.

üëâLearn what to do in a flood: https://t.co/yDrqZN037T

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/i10cYZkcUj

tweets.text:
We're supporting London Flood Awareness Week. 

Would you know what to do if your part of #London flooded? 

Follow @LDN_Environment all week for information on #flood risk and how you can be prepared - https://t.co/ppj7sgmsEe 

#PrepareActSurvive #LDNFloodAware #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/XP2moVRwSU

Also discovered recently that @EnvAgency budget for environmental protection has been cut from ¬£100m to ¬£15m in past 10 yrs. Doesn't look good for promises about upholding environmental protections and being the first generation to leave the environment in a better state  2/2

Taking steps to prepare for flooding, and knowing what to do in a #flood can reduce damage to your home and possessions by 40%.

Find out what to do when you receive a flood warning, and download our simple flood plan: https://t.co/ZEHl74ryiJ
#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/F548tn2LzP

Do you live in an area at risk of flooding?‚òîÔ∏è

You don't have to be next to a river or the sea. Flooding can come from different sources so be #FloodAware by checking your risk at https://t.co/TfMNGBSfGK

Follow @LDN_Environment & @envagencySE 

#FloodActionWeek #LDNFloodAware https://t.co/3A4cS4Y0FX

Our fisheries enforcement officers have joined forces with @DurhamPolice in a rural crime crackdown in the North East. 

It follows reports of illegal fishing and anti-social behaviour in areas of Weardale. 

#illegal 
#crime 
#fishing 

Read more: https://t.co/FOYluBoUEi https://t.co/XeVBjBHCCH

Find out here https://t.co/wwueotSYc7 

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware https://t.co/bxRTmDU40x

We want the Humber to be prosperous in the face of climate change. 

Communities recover quicker from flooding when they have a plan, which is good for the local economy.

Find out more  https://t.co/wwueotBnkz

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware

tweets.text:
Having a 'trigger' to notify you of a #flood BEFORE it happens can allow time to prepare.

The @EnvAgencyNW Flood Warning Service is one such trigger, but do you know what the different stages mean?

Read our blog to learn more: https://t.co/5Hv1sflggt

#preparedness #floodaware https://t.co/6lrgoWi2Vw
It's #FloodActionWeek - a good time to sign up for these webinarsüëç https://t.co/iGIDL8ZJqn

Check out the 5 things you can do this #FloodActionWeek to be better prepared for a flood.

Take action to protect yourself, your family and your home now. üëá

https://t.co/PzDbHFZ82f

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/MygPPn6XQu
